- from abroad: +1 519 772 3570

Saturday and Sunday: 9:00 AM to 7:30 PM

@TangerineLab Hello @TangerineLab, thank you for your tweet. The lounge at terminal A, in front of Gate 20 is open daily from 10:30 AM until the last flight. You can find more on the link https://t.co/oqi668gYYj.
We remain available should you require any further clarification.
